channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: The Name of a Man I've Never Met
item.description: This is Wallsberg. It’s a beautiful town tucked away where my Grandfather purchased a plot of land in the 1970’s. I’ve driven past the exit to this little town of 300 people at least a hundred times on the commute from Provo to Park City, Utah. But three weeks ago, as I was going to a friend’s house, I decided to stop by and see what belonged to my family.
